text: Explosive Brigade Against the Ninjas () is a 1986 Argentine adventure comedy movie directed by Miguel Fernández Alonso and starring Moria Casán, Emilio Disi, Gino Renni. It is a sequel to the 1986 Argentine movie Brigada explosiva. == Other websites == * Category:1986 adventure movies Category:1986 comedy movies Category:Argentine adventure movies Category:Argentine comedy movies
title: Explosive Brigade Against the Ninjas
